name: The Die Dies
description:
Description

In the world of board games, pieces tend to follow the rules of the game.

A die, tired of being considered just another inanimate piece of the game, wants to be free!

With the help of a magic brush, the die paints new faces on its 6 sides and acquires powers...

Fire, Ice, Thunder, Grass, Earth and Air become your new skills!

But getting out of the board world won't be that easy...

Controls

- Arrow keys to move around

- Use the skills of the die's faces against your enemies

- Don't let the board pieces catch you

- Conquer freedom!
